sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_054585c85f220100a9ad2572f2b47713
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_dictionary</collection><condition>current.default_value.changes() || current.dynamic_default_value.changes() || current.use_dynamic_default.changesTo(false)</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Sync default value</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[synchronizeDefaultValue(current);

function synchronizeDefaultValue(gr) {
	if (gr.default_value.changes()) {
		gr.dynamic_default_value = getDynamicDefaultValue(gr.default_value.toString());
		gr.use_dynamic_default = (gr.dynamic_default_value == '') ? false : true;
	} else if (gr.dynamic_default_value.changes()) {
		gr.default_value = getDefaultValue(gr);
		gr.use_dynamic_default = (gr.default_value == '') ? false : true;
	} else if (gr.use_dynamic_default.changesTo(false)) {
		gr.default_value = '';
		gr.dynamic_default_value = '';
	}
}

function getDynamicDefaultValue(defaultValue) {
	defaultValue = defaultValue.trim();
	if (isValidJavascriptCall(defaultValue)) {
		defaultValue = defaultValue.substring("javascript:".length);
		if (defaultValue.endsWith(';'))
			defaultValue = defaultValue.substring(0, defaultValue.length - 1);
		
		var dyn = new GlideRecord('sys_filter_option_dynamic');
		dyn.addQuery('script', defaultValue).addOrCondition('script', defaultValue + ';');
		dyn.query();
		if (dyn.next())
			return dyn.sys_id.toString();
	}
	
	return '';
}

function isValidJavascriptCall(str) {
	if (str.indexOf('javascript:') != 0)
			return false;
			
	if (str.substring('javascript:'.length) == '')
		return false;
		
	return true;
}

function getDefaultValue(gr) {
	if (gr.dynamic_default_value.script.nil())
		return '';
	
	return 'javascript:' + gr.dynamic_default_value.script;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.james</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-07-08 20:27:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>054585c85f220100a9ad2572f2b47713</sys_id><sys_mod_count>38</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sync default value</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Dynamic Operands for Dictionary" source="com.glide.dynamic_operands.dict">d9200646db032010d4f93fd3e29619cf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_054585c85f220100a9ad2572f2b47713</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 20:28:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=054585c85f220100a9ad2572f2b47713"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.get test alert ci class name</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>get test alert ci class name</name><script><![CDATA[Javascript: var alert = new GlideRecord('em_alert');
alert.addQuery('sys_id',"=",current.u_test_alert);
alert.query();
if(alert.next()){
var ci = alert.cmdb_ci;
}
if(ci){
var cItem = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
cItem.addQuery('sys_id',"=",ci);
cItem.query();
if(cItem.next()){
var ciClass = cItem.sys_class_name;
}
}
"name="+ciClass+'^ORname=cmdb_ci';]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt.morris</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 20:47:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ab6afca4707011024307601e36d43cc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>get test alert ci class name</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4ab6afca4707011024307601e36d43cc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 20:47:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_dictionary_u_alert_tag_normalization_u_source_key
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_source_key" table="u_alert_tag_normalization"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[JSON.unflatten = function(data) {
    "use strict";
    if (Object(data) !== data || Array.isArray(data))
        return data;
    var result = {}, cur, prop, idx, last, temp;
    for(var p in data) {
        cur = result, prop = "", last = 0;
        do {
            idx = p.indexOf(".", last);
            temp = p.substring(last, idx !== -1 ? idx : undefined);
            cur = cur[prop] || (cur[prop] = (!isNaN(parseInt(temp)) ? [] : {}));
            prop = temp;
            last = idx + 1;
        } while(idx >= 0);
        cur[prop] = data[p];
    }
    return result[""];
};

JSON.flatten = function(data) {
    var result = {};
    function recurse (cur, prop) {
        if (Object(cur) !== cur) {
            result[prop] = cur;
        } else if (Array.isArray(cur)) {
             for(var i=0, l=cur.length; i<l; i++)
                 recurse(cur[i], prop ? prop+"."+i : ""+i);
            if (l == 0)
                result[prop] = [];
        } else {
            var isEmpty = true;
            for (var p in cur) {
                isEmpty = false;
                recurse(cur[p], prop ? prop+"."+p : p);
            }
            if (isEmpty)
                result[prop] = {};
        }
    }
    recurse(data, "");
    return result;
};

(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	var sourceKeys = [];
	var tAlert = new GlideRecord('em_alert');
	tAlert.addQuery('sys_id',"=",current.u_test_alert);
	tAlert.query();
	
	while(tAlert.next()) {
		var info = tAlert.additional_info;
	}
	
	var parser = new JSONParser();
	var data = parser.parse(info);
	data = JSON.flatten(data);
	var key;
	for (key in data) {
		sourceKeys.push(key);
	}
	
	return sourceKeys;  // return the calculated value

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field>category</choice_field><choice_table/><column_label>Source Key</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_source_key</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="String">string</internal_type><mandatory>true</mandatory><max_length>100</max_length><name>u_alert_tag_normalization</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt.morris</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-16 03:04:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>db7377121bb3b890d575979cbc4bcbda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Source Key</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_alert_tag_normalization_u_source_key</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-16 03:26:03</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_alert_tag_normalization</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_alert_tag_normalization">u_source_keyISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_source_key" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>No Duplicate Source Keys</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var dupeGR = new GlideRecord('u_alert_tag_normalization');
	dupeGR.addQuery('u_source_key', '=', current.u_source_key);
	dupeGR.addQuery('u_normalized_key', '=', current.u_normalized_key);	
	dupeGR.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	dupeGR.addQuery('u_active', '=', true);
	if(current.u_applies_to_source) {
		dupeGR.addQuery('u_applies_to_source', '=', current.u_applies_to_source);
		}
	dupeGR.query();
	if(dupeGR.next()) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Multiple Normalization records with the same source-key and the same applies-to-source and the same normalized key are not allowed."));

		current.setAbortAction(true);		
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt.morris</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-18 18:47:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a210addf1bbffc90d575979cbc4bcbca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>No Duplicate Source Keys</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a210addf1bbffc90d575979cbc4bcbca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-06 19:48:18</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a210addf1bbffc90d575979cbc4bcbca"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>em_alert</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>TBAC Tag Normalization BR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[JSON.unflatten = function(data) {
    "use strict";
    if (Object(data) !== data || Array.isArray(data))
        return data;
    var result = {}, cur, prop, idx, last, temp;
    for(var p in data) {
        cur = result, prop = "", last = 0;
        do {
            idx = p.indexOf(".", last);
            temp = p.substring(last, idx !== -1 ? idx : undefined);
            cur = cur[prop] || (cur[prop] = (!isNaN(parseInt(temp)) ? [] : {}));
            prop = temp;
            last = idx + 1;
        } while(idx >= 0);
        cur[prop] = data[p];
    }
    return result[""];
};

JSON.flatten = function(data) {
    var result = {};
    function recurse (cur, prop) {
        if (Object(cur) !== cur) {
            result[prop] = cur;
        } else if (Array.isArray(cur)) {
             for(var i=0, l=cur.length; i<l; i++)
                 recurse(cur[i], prop ? prop+"."+i : ""+i);
            if (l == 0)
                result[prop] = [];
        } else {
            var isEmpty = true;
            for (var p in cur) {
                isEmpty = false;
                recurse(cur[p], prop ? prop+"."+p : p);
            }
            if (isEmpty)
                result[prop] = {};
        }
    }
    recurse(data, "");
    return result;
};

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	var norm_obj = {};
	var source_norm_obj = {};
	var field_norm_obj = {};
	var source_field_norm_obj = {};
	var ci_field_norm_obj = {};
	var source_ci_field_norm_obj = {};
    var info = current.additional_info;
	var formatRx = new RegExp(/\/(.*)\/, '(.*)'/);
	var newKey;
	var newValue;
    info = info.replace(/\|/g, "~");
    info = info.replace(/\./g, "|");
    var parser = new JSONParser();
    var data = parser.parse(info);
    data = JSON.flatten(data);
    var key;
    var nKey;
	var tags_obj = {};
    for (key in norm_obj) {
        if (data.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
            var nInside = norm_obj[key];
            for (nKey in nInside) {
                newKey = nKey;
                newValue = data[key];
                var att = nInside[nKey];
                if (att) {
                    var rx = att["regex"];
                    if (rx) {
                        var rxMatch = formatRx.exec(rx);
                        var rxFunc = new RegExp(rxMatch[1], "gm");
                        var rxTest = rxFunc.test(newValue);
                        var rxRep = rxMatch[2];
                        if (rxMatch && rxTest) {
                            newValue = newValue.replace(rxFunc, rxRep);
                        } else {
                            newValue = null;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
                }
            }
        }
    }

    var source = current.source;
    if (source_norm_obj.hasOwnProperty(source)) {
        var sourceNorm = source_norm_obj[source];
        sourceNorm = JSON.stringify(sourceNorm);
        sourceNorm = parser.parse(sourceNorm);
        var sKey;
        var sNKey;
        for (sKey in sourceNorm) {
            if (data.hasOwnProperty(sKey)) {
                var sNInside = sourceNorm[sKey];
                for (sNKey in sNInside) {
                    newKey = sNKey;
                    newValue = data[sKey];
                    var sAtt = sNInside[sNKey];
                    if (sAtt) {
                        var sRx = sAtt["regex"];
                        if (sRx) {
                            var sRxMatch = formatRx.exec(sRx);
                            var sRxFunc = new RegExp(sRxMatch[1], "gm");
                            var sRxTest = sRxFunc.test(newValue);
                            var sRxRep = sRxMatch[2];
                            if (sRxMatch && sRxTest) {
                                newValue = newValue.replace(sRxFunc, sRxRep);
                            } else {
                                newValue = null;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    if (newValue) {
                        data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
						tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    var fKey;
    var fNKey;
    for (fKey in field_norm_obj) {
        if (current.getValue(fKey)) {
            var fNInside = field_norm_obj[fKey];
            for (fNKey in fNInside) {
                newKey = fNKey;
                newValue = current.getValue(fKey);
                var fAtt = fNInside[fNKey];
                if (fAtt) {
                    var fRx = fAtt["regex"];
                    if (fRx) {
                        var fRxMatch = formatRx.exec(fRx);
                        var fRxFunc = new RegExp(fRxMatch[1], "gm");
                        var fRxTest = fRxFunc.test(newValue);
                        var fRxRep = fRxMatch[2];
                        if (fRxMatch && fRxTest) {
                            newValue = newValue.replace(fRxFunc, fRxRep);
                        } else {
                            newValue = null;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
                }
            }
        }
    }

   if (source_field_norm_obj.hasOwnProperty(source)) {
        var sourceFieldNorm = source_field_norm_obj[source];
        sourceFieldNorm = JSON.stringify(sourceFieldNorm);
        sourceFieldNorm = parser.parse(sourceFieldNorm);
        var sFKey;
		var sFNKey;
        for (sFKey in sourceFieldNorm) {
            if (current.getValue(sFKey)) {
				var sFNInside = sourceFieldNorm[sFKey];
				for (sFNKey in sFNInside) {
                newKey = sFNKey;
                newValue = current.getValue(sFKey);
				var sFAtt = sFNInside[sFNKey];
				if(sFAtt) {
					var sFRx = sFAtt["regex"];
					if (sFRx) {
						var sFRxMatch = formatRx.exec(sFRx);
						var sFRxFunc = new RegExp(sFRxMatch[1], "gm");
						var sFRxTest = sFRxFunc.test(newValue);
						var sFRxRep = sFRxMatch[2];
						if (sFRxMatch && sFRxTest) {
							newValue = newValue.replace(sFRxFunc, sFRxRep);
						} else {
							newValue = null;
						}
						}
					}
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
                }
				}
            }
        }
    }
    var cFKey;
    var cFNKey;
    for (cFKey in ci_field_norm_obj) {
        if (current.cmdb_ci.getRefRecord().getValue(cFKey)) {
            var cFNInside = ci_field_norm_obj[cFKey];
            for (cFNKey in cFNInside) {
                newKey = cFNKey;
                newValue = current.cmdb_ci.getRefRecord().getValue(cFKey);
                var cFAtt = cFNInside[cFNKey];
                if (cFAtt) {
                    var cFRx = cFAtt["regex"];
                    if (cFRx) {
                        var cFRxMatch = formatRx.exec(cFRx);
                        var cFRxFunc = new RegExp(cFRxMatch[1], "gm");
                        var cFRxTest = cFRxFunc.test(newValue);
                        var cFRxRep = cFRxMatch[2];
                        if (cFRxMatch && cFRxTest) {
                            newValue = newValue.replace(cFRxFunc, cFRxRep);
                        } else {
                            newValue = null;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
                }
            }
        }
    }

   if (source_ci_field_norm_obj.hasOwnProperty(source)) {
        var sourceCFieldNorm = source_ci_field_norm_obj[source];
        sourceCFieldNorm = JSON.stringify(sourceCFieldNorm);
        sourceCFieldNorm = parser.parse(sourceCFieldNorm);
        var sCFKey;
		var sCFNKey;
        for (sCFKey in sourceCFieldNorm) {
            if (current.cmdb_ci.getRefRecord().getValue(sCFKey)) {
				var sCFNInside = sourceCFieldNorm[sCFKey];
				for (sCFNKey in sCFNInside) {
                newKey = sCFNKey;
                newValue = current.cmdb_ci.getRefRecord().getValue(sCFKey);
				var sCFAtt = sCFNInside[sCFNKey];
				if(sCFAtt) {
					var sCFRx = sCFAtt["regex"];
					if (sCFRx) {
						var sCFRxMatch = formatRx.exec(sCFRx);
						var sCFRxFunc = new RegExp(sCFRxMatch[1], "gm");
						var sCFRxTest = sCFRxFunc.test(newValue);
						var sCFRxRep = cSFRxMatch[2];
						if (sCFRxMatch && sCFRxTest) {
							newValue = newValue.replace(sCFRxFunc, sCFRxRep);
						} else {
							newValue = null;
						}
						}
					}
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
                }
				}
            }
        }
    }

    data = JSON.unflatten(data);
    var ai_string = JSON.stringify(data, null, "	");
	tags_obj = JSON.stringify(tags_obj, null, "	");
    ai_string = ai_string.replace(/\|/g, ".");
    ai_string = ai_string.replace(/~/g, "|");
    current.additional_info = ai_string;
	current.u_itom_tags = tags_obj;
    current.update();

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt.morris</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-29 01:49:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>255</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TBAC Tag Normalization BR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 18:27:06</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_dictionary_u_alert_tag_normalization_u_source_key
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_source_key" table="u_alert_tag_normalization"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[JSON.unflatten = function(data) {
    "use strict";
    if (Object(data) !== data || Array.isArray(data))
        return data;
    var result = {}, cur, prop, idx, last, temp;
    for(var p in data) {
        cur = result, prop = "", last = 0;
        do {
            idx = p.indexOf(".", last);
            temp = p.substring(last, idx !== -1 ? idx : undefined);
            cur = cur[prop] || (cur[prop] = (!isNaN(parseInt(temp)) ? [] : {}));
            prop = temp;
            last = idx + 1;
        } while(idx >= 0);
        cur[prop] = data[p];
    }
    return result[""];
};

JSON.flatten = function(data) {
    var result = {};
    function recurse (cur, prop) {
        if (Object(cur) !== cur) {
            result[prop] = cur;
        } else if (Array.isArray(cur)) {
             for(var i=0, l=cur.length; i<l; i++)
                 recurse(cur[i], prop ? prop+"."+i : ""+i);
            if (l == 0)
                result[prop] = [];
        } else {
            var isEmpty = true;
            for (var p in cur) {
                isEmpty = false;
                recurse(cur[p], prop ? prop+"."+p : p);
            }
            if (isEmpty)
                result[prop] = {};
        }
    }
    recurse(data, "");
    return result;
};

(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	var sourceKeys = [];
	var tAlert = new GlideRecord('em_alert');
	tAlert.addQuery('sys_id',"=",current.u_test_alert);
	tAlert.query();
	
	while(tAlert.next()) {
		var info = tAlert.additional_info;
	}
	
	var parser = new JSONParser();
	var data = parser.parse(info);
	data = JSON.flatten(data);
	var key;
	for (key in data) {
		sourceKeys.push(key);
	}
	
	return sourceKeys;  // return the calculated value

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field>category</choice_field><choice_table/><column_label>Source Key</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>true</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_source_key</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="String">string</internal_type><mandatory>true</mandatory><max_length>100</max_length><name>u_alert_tag_normalization</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt.morris</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-16 03:04:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>db7377121bb3b890d575979cbc4bcbda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Source Key</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_alert_tag_normalization_u_source_key</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-18 14:25:14</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_dictionary</collection><condition>current.dynamic_ref_qual.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Edit Dynamic Value from List View</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[updateDynamic();
cleanSimple();
cleanDynamic();


function updateDynamic(){
var currentUseReferenceQual = current.use_reference_qualifier; 
	if (((currentUseReferenceQual == 'simple'|| currentUseReferenceQual == 'advanced' ) || currentUseReferenceQual == 'dynamic' ) && !current.dynamic_ref_qual.nil()){
			current.use_reference_qualifier = 'dynamic';
			current.reference_qual = "javascript:" + current.dynamic_ref_qual.script;
	} else {
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'simple';
		current.reference_qual = "";
		}
}

function cleanSimple() {
	var curUseRef = current.use_reference_qualifier;
	if (curUseRef == 'dynamic') 
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
	else if (curUseRef == 'advanced') 
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
}

function cleanDynamic() {
	var curUseRef = current.use_reference_qualifier;
	if (curUseRef == 'simple') 
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
	else if (curUseRef == 'advanced') 
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
}
	
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-04-04 20:22:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>1f30a7764733110005c7d8966c9a71b0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Edit Dynamic Value from List View</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Dynamic Operands for Dictionary" source="com.glide.dynamic_operands.dict">d9200646db032010d4f93fd3e29619cf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1f30a7764733110005c7d8966c9a71b0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 20:32:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1f30a7764733110005c7d8966c9a71b0"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_02f8e2039703c590ada0b9cfe153afce
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>em_alert</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="em_alert">group_source=2^state!=Closed^NQparent.group_source=2^state!=Closed^EQ<item display_value="Rules-based" endquery="false" field="group_source" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="2"/><item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="Closed"/><item display_value="Rules-based" endquery="false" field="parent.group_source" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="=" or="false" value="2"/><item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="Closed"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate TBAC Reasoning</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var reasoning = "";
    var ai = current.additional_info;
    var parser = new JSONParser();
    var data = parser.parse(ai);

    var query = 'element_idSTARTSWITH' + current.sys_id + '^valueLIKEcorrelation rule';
    var wn = new GlideRecord('sys_journal_field');
    wn.addEncodedQuery(query);
    wn.query();

    var rule;
    var i = 0;
    while (i < 1 && wn.next()) {
        if (current.group_source == '5') {
            var rx = new RegExp(/.*em_alert_correlation_rule\.do\?sys_id=([^"]{1,}).*em_alert\.do\?sys_id=([^"]{1,}).*/gm);
        }

        if (current.group_source == '2') {
            var rx = new RegExp(/.*em_alert_correlation_rule\.do\?sys_id=([^"]{1,}).*/gm);
        }
        var exec = rx.exec(wn.value);
        if (exec[1]) {
            rule = exec[1];
        }

        if (exec[2]) {
            var parent = exec[2];
        }

        i++;
    }
    gs.info('tbac reasoning rule: ' + rule);
    var definition = new GlideRecord('sn_em_tbac_alert_clustering_definitions');
	definition.get("alert_correlation_rule", rule);
	reasoning = definition.name;
    /*definition.addQuery('alert_correlation_rule', "=", rule);
    definition.query();

    if (definition.next()) {
        var tags = new GlideRecord('sn_em_tbac_alert_clustering_definitions_tags_m2m');
        tags.addQuery('alert_clustering_definition', "=", definition.sys_id);
        tags.query();
        while (tags.next()) {
            var tag = tags.alert_clustering_tag.getRefRecord();
            if (tag.source == "em_alert") {
                var key = tag.selected_field.getRefRecord().element;
                var value = current.getValue(key);
                reasoning[key] = value;
            }

            if (tag.source == "additional_info") {
                var key = tag.additional_info_key;
                var value = data[key];
                reasoning[key] = value;
            }

            if (tag.source == "cmdb_ci") {
                //add
            }

            if (tag.source == "cmdb_key_value") {
                //add
            }
        }
		
    }*/
	gs.info('u_tbac_reasoning: ' + reasoning);
    current.u_tbac_reasoning = reasoning;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 19:04:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>02f8e2039703c590ada0b9cfe153afce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate TBAC Reasoning</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_02f8e2039703c590ada0b9cfe153afce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-03 15:58:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=02f8e2039703c590ada0b9cfe153afce"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>em_alert</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="em_alert">state!=Closed^EQ<item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="Closed"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Repeated Alerts</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	gs.log("Repeated Alerts BR");
	var message_key = "";
	var emAiInsightCommon = new EmAiInsightCommon();
	var repeatAlertGr = new GlideAggregate('em_alert');
	if(current.is_group_alert != null && current.is_group_alert) {
		// For virtual alert we should
		// 1. Find the message key of the secondary alert that create the virtual alert
		// 2. Dont show the secondary alert that create the virtual alert
		// gs.log("Alert Insight: calculate Repeated Alerts for virtual group");
		message_key = emAiInsightCommon.getMessageKeyForVirtualAlertQuery(current);
		if(GlideStringUtil.notNil(message_key)) {
			repeatAlertGr.addQuery("message_key", "=", message_key);
		}
		repeatAlertGr.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", current.message_key);
	}
	if(GlideStringUtil.nil(message_key)) { // this means it is not a virtual alert
		repeatAlertGr.addQuery("message_key", "=", current.message_key);
	}
	emAiInsightCommon.addNotTheSameSysIdQuery(repeatAlertGr, current);
	emAiInsightCommon.addTimeBeforeQuery(repeatAlertGr, "evt_mgmt.alert_insight_alert_history_min", 43200 /* 30 days */);
	//gs.log("Alert Insight: calculate Repeated Alerts. Query string: " + repeatAlertGr.getEncodedQuery() );
	repeatAlertGr.addAggregate('COUNT');
	repeatAlertGr.query();
	while (repeatAlertGr.next()) {
		gs.log("Repeated Alerts: " + repeatAlertGr.getAggregate('COUNT'));
		current.u_repeated_alerts = repeatAlertGr.getAggregate('COUNT');
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>optimiz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-04 16:01:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Repeated Alerts</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>optimiz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 16:32:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_7c4072105f220100a9ad2572f2b47750
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_dictionary</collection><condition>current.use_reference_qualifier.changes() || current.reference_qual_condition.changes() </condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Reference Qualifier Value</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[checkForUpdateRefQual();
cleanSimple();
cleanDynamic();

function checkForUpdateRefQual() {
	var currentUseReferenceQual = current.use_reference_qualifier;
	if (currentUseReferenceQual == 'simple')
		current.reference_qual = current.reference_qual_condition;
	else if (currentUseReferenceQual == 'dynamic') {
		if (current.dynamic_ref_qual.nil())
			current.reference_qual = "";
		else
			current.reference_qual = "javascript:" + current.dynamic_ref_qual.script;
	} else if (currentUseReferenceQual == 'advanced') {
		var curRef = current.reference_qual.trim();
		curRef = curRef.substring("javascript:".length);
		if (curRef == "")
			return;
			
		if (curRef.endsWith(";"))
			curRef = curRef.substring(0, curRef.length - 1);
			
		var dyn = new GlideRecord("sys_filter_option_dynamic");
		dyn.addQuery("script", curRef).addOrCondition("script", curRef + ";");	
		dyn.query();
		if (dyn.next()) {
			current.use_reference_qualifier = 'dynamic';
			current.dynamic_ref_qual = dyn.sys_id;
		}
	}
	return;	
}

function cleanSimple() {
	var currentUseReferenceQual = current.use_reference_qualifier;
	if (currentUseReferenceQual == 'dynamic') {
		current.reference_qual_condition = null;
	} else if (currentUseReferenceQual == 'advanced'){
		current.reference_qual_condition = null;
	}
}

function cleanDynamic() {
	var currentUseReferenceQual = current.use_reference_qualifier;
	if (currentUseReferenceQual == 'simple') 
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
	 else if (currentUseReferenceQual == 'advanced') 
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
	
}
	
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.james</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-07-09 22:50:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>7c4072105f220100a9ad2572f2b47750</sys_id><sys_mod_count>82</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reference Qualifier Value</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Dynamic Operands for Dictionary" source="com.glide.dynamic_operands.dict">d9200646db032010d4f93fd3e29619cf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7c4072105f220100a9ad2572f2b47750</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 20:32:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7c4072105f220100a9ad2572f2b47750"/></record_update>

        }



    })();
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt.morris</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-01 18:23:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f357586b1b048d10d575979cbc4bcb78</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>After ATN Delete</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f357586b1b048d10d575979cbc4bcb78</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-01 18:33:52</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f357586b1b048d10d575979cbc4bcb78"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_0bb57d5e4733110005c7d8966c9a71fc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_dictionary</collection><condition>current.reference_qual.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Sync Reference Qual</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[updateRefQual();
cleanSimple();
cleanDynamic();

function updateRefQual(){
	if (current.reference_qual.trim().indexOf("javascript:") != 0) {   
		current.reference_qual_condition = current.reference_qual.trim();
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'simple';
		return;
	} 
	
	var currentReferenceQual = current.reference_qual.trim();
	currentReferenceQual = currentReferenceQual.substring("javascript:".length);
	if (currentReferenceQual == "")
		return;
		
	if (currentReferenceQual.endsWith(";"))
		currentReferenceQual = currentReferenceQual.substring(0, currentReferenceQual.length - 1);
		
	var dyn = new GlideRecord("sys_filter_option_dynamic");
	dyn.addQuery("script", currentReferenceQual).addOrCondition("script", currentReferenceQual + ";");	
	dyn.query();
	if (dyn.next()) {
		gs.print("Dynamic: " + currentReferenceQual);
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'dynamic';
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = dyn.sys_id;
		
	} else
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'advanced';
}

function cleanSimple() {
	var curUseRef = current.use_reference_qualifier;
	if (curUseRef == 'dynamic') 
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
	 else if (curUseRef == 'advanced')
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
}

function cleanDynamic() {
	var curUseRef = current.use_reference_qualifier;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e5e08e505f220100a9ad2572f2b477f9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_dictionary</collection><condition>!current.reference_qual.nil()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Sync on Display Reference Qualifier</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[setRefQual();

function setRefQual(){
	if (isSimple(current.reference_qual)) {
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'simple';
		current.reference_qual_condition = current.reference_qual.trim();
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
		safeUpdate();
		return;
	}
	
	if (isAdvanced(current.reference_qual)) {
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'advanced';
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
		safeUpdate();
		return;
	}
	
	var currentReferenceQual = current.reference_qual.trim();
	currentReferenceQual = currentReferenceQual.substring("javascript:".length);
	if (currentReferenceQual == "") {
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'simple';
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
		current.reference_qual = "";
		safeUpdate();
		return;
	}
	
	if (currentReferenceQual.endsWith(";"))
		currentReferenceQual = currentReferenceQual.substring(0, currentReferenceQual.length - 1);
		
	var dyn = new GlideRecord("sys_filter_option_dynamic");
	dyn.addQuery("script", currentReferenceQual).addOrCondition("script", currentReferenceQual + ";");
	dyn.query();
	if (dyn.next()) {
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'dynamic';
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = dyn.sys_id;
	} else {
		current.reference_qual_condition = "";
		current.dynamic_ref_qual = "";
		current.use_reference_qualifier = 'advanced';
	}
	
	safeUpdate();
}

function isSimple(refQual) {
	return refQual.indexOf("javascript:") == -1;
}

function isAdvanced(refQual) {
	return refQual.trim().indexOf("javascript:") > 0;
}

function safeUpdate() {
	current.setWorkflow(false);
	current.autoSysFields(false);
	current.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.james</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-07-09 19:27:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>e5e08e505f220100a9ad2572f2b477f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>59</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sync on Display Reference Qualifier</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Dynamic Operands for Dictionary" source="com.glide.dynamic_operands.dict">d9200646db032010d4f93fd3e29619cf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e5e08e505f220100a9ad2572f2b477f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 20:32:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e5e08e505f220100a9ad2572f2b477f9"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>em_alert</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>TBAC Tag Normalization BR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[JSON.unflatten = function(data) {
    "use strict";
    if (Object(data) !== data || Array.isArray(data))
        return data;
    var result = {}, cur, prop, idx, last, temp;
    for(var p in data) {
        cur = result, prop = "", last = 0;
        do {
            idx = p.indexOf(".", last);
            temp = p.substring(last, idx !== -1 ? idx : undefined);
            cur = cur[prop] || (cur[prop] = (!isNaN(parseInt(temp)) ? [] : {}));
            prop = temp;
            last = idx + 1;
        } while(idx >= 0);
        cur[prop] = data[p];
    }
    return result[""];
};

JSON.flatten = function(data) {
    var result = {};
    function recurse (cur, prop) {
        if (Object(cur) !== cur) {
            result[prop] = cur;
        } else if (Array.isArray(cur)) {
             for(var i=0, l=cur.length; i<l; i++)
                 recurse(cur[i], prop ? prop+"."+i : ""+i);
            if (l == 0)
                result[prop] = [];
        } else {
            var isEmpty = true;
            for (var p in cur) {
                isEmpty = false;
                recurse(cur[p], prop ? prop+"."+p : p);
            }
            if (isEmpty)
                result[prop] = {};
        }
    }
    recurse(data, "");
    return result;
};

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	var norm_obj = {"iso|org|dod|internet|private|enterprises|791|3|2|1|2|1|1":{"tbac-type":{},"application":{}},"appsvc":{"tbac-type":{},"application":{}},"details.0.svc":{"tbac-type":{},"application":{}},"app":{"tbac-type":{},"application":{}}};
	var source_norm_obj = {"Datadog":{"details.0.geo":{"tbac-region":{"regex":"/N(.*)/, '$1'"}}},"DYNATRACE":{"tags.0":{"tbac-environment":{"regex":"/(.*)Environment:(.*)/, '$2'"}}},"Splunk":{"used_for":{"tbac-environment":{}}}};
	var field_norm_obj = {};
	var source_field_norm_obj = {"Cisco Prime":{"metric_name":{"tbac-newciscomn":{"regex":"/(.*)-(.*)-(.*)/, '$3'"},"tbac-node":{"regex":"/(?:Alert|Reset) #1 Finastra - Node is down(.*) Node (.*?) is (?:Down|Up)(.*)/, '$2'"},"tbac-location":{"regex":"/(.*)Location : (.*)/, '$2 use this'"}}},"SolarWinds":{"description":{"tbac-newciscomn":{"regex":"/(.*)-(.*)-(.*)/, '$3'"},"tbac-node":{"regex":"/(?:Alert|Reset) #1 Finastra - Node is down(.*) Node (.*?) is (?:Down|Up)(.*)/, '$2'"},"tbac-location":{"regex":"/(.*)Location : (.*)/, '$2 use this'"}}}};
    var info = current.additional_info;
	var formatRx = new RegExp(/\/(.*)\/, '(.*)'/);
	var newKey;
	var newValue;
    info = info.replace(/\|/g, "~");
    info = info.replace(/\./g, "|");
    var parser = new JSONParser();
    var data = parser.parse(info);
    data = JSON.flatten(data);
    var key;
    var nKey;
	var tags_obj = {};
    for (key in norm_obj) {
        if (data.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
            var nInside = norm_obj[key];
            for (nKey in nInside) {
                newKey = nKey;
                newValue = data[key];
                var att = nInside[nKey];
                if (att) {
                    var rx = att["regex"];
                    if (rx) {
                        var rxMatch = formatRx.exec(rx);
                        var rxFunc = new RegExp(rxMatch[1], "gm");
                        var rxTest = rxFunc.test(newValue);
                        var rxRep = rxMatch[2];
                        if (rxMatch && rxTest) {
                            newValue = newValue.replace(rxFunc, rxRep);
                        } else {
                            newValue = null;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
                }
            }
        }
    }

    var source = current.source;
    if (source_norm_obj.hasOwnProperty(source)) {
        var sourceNorm = source_norm_obj[source];
        sourceNorm = JSON.stringify(sourceNorm);
        sourceNorm = parser.parse(sourceNorm);
        var sKey;
        var sNKey;
        for (sKey in sourceNorm) {
            if (data.hasOwnProperty(sKey)) {
                var sNInside = sourceNorm[sKey];
                for (sNKey in sNInside) {
                    newKey = sNKey;
                    newValue = data[sKey];
                    var sAtt = sNInside[sNKey];
                    if (sAtt) {
                        var sRx = sAtt["regex"];
                        if (sRx) {
                            var sRxMatch = formatRx.exec(sRx);
                            var sRxFunc = new RegExp(sRxMatch[1], "gm");
                            var sRxTest = sRxFunc.test(newValue);
                            var sRxRep = sRxMatch[2];
                            if (sRxMatch && sRxTest) {
                                newValue = newValue.replace(sRxFunc, sRxRep);
                            } else {
                                newValue = null;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    if (newValue) {
                        data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
						tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();						
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    var fKey;
    var fNKey;
    for (fKey in field_norm_obj) {
        if (current.getValue(fKey)) {
            var fNInside = field_norm_obj[fKey];
            for (fNKey in fNInside) {
                newKey = fNKey;
                newValue = current.getValue(fKey);
                var fAtt = fNInside[fNKey];
                if (fAtt) {
                    var fRx = fAtt["regex"];
                    if (fRx) {
                        var fRxMatch = formatRx.exec(fRx);
                        var fRxFunc = new RegExp(fRxMatch[1], "gm");
                        var fRxTest = fRxFunc.test(newValue);
                        var fRxRep = fRxMatch[2];
                        if (fRxMatch && fRxTest) {
                            newValue = newValue.replace(fRxFunc, fRxRep);
                        } else {
                            newValue = null;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();					
                }
            }
        }
    }

   if (source_field_norm_obj.hasOwnProperty(source)) {
        var sourceFieldNorm = source_field_norm_obj[source];
        sourceFieldNorm = JSON.stringify(sourceFieldNorm);
        sourceFieldNorm = parser.parse(sourceFieldNorm);
        var sFKey;
		var sFNKey;
        for (sFKey in sourceFieldNorm) {
            if (current.getValue(sFKey)) {
				var sFNInside = sourceFieldNorm[sFKey];
				for (sFNKey in sFNInside) {
                newKey = sFNKey;
                newValue = current.getValue(sFKey);
				var sFAtt = sFNInside[sFNKey];
				if(sFAtt) {
					var sFRx = sFAtt["regex"];
					if (sFRx) {
						var sFRxMatch = formatRx.exec(sFRx);
						var sFRxFunc = new RegExp(sFRxMatch[1], "gm");
						var sFRxTest = sFRxFunc.test(newValue);
						var sFRxRep = sFRxMatch[2];
						if (sFRxMatch && sFRxTest) {
							newValue = newValue.replace(sFRxFunc, sFRxRep);
						} else {
							newValue = null;
						}
						}
					}
                if (newValue) {
                    data[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();
					tags_obj[newKey] = newValue.toLowerCase();					
                }
				}
            }
        }
    }
	data["itom_tags"] = tags_obj;
    data = JSON.unflatten(data);
    var ai_string = JSON.stringify(data, null, "	");
    ai_string = ai_string.replace(/\|/g, ".");
    ai_string = ai_string.replace(/~/g, "|");
    current.additional_info = ai_string;
    current.update();

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt.morris</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-29 01:49:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>223</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TBAC Tag Normalization BR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt.morris</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 19:31:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=212472281bab3410d575979cbc4bcb7b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>em_alert</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="em_alert">state!=Closed^EQ<item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="Closed"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Repeated Alerts</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	gs.log("Repeated Alerts BR");
	var message_key = "";
	var emAiInsightCommon = new EmAiInsightCommon();
	var repeatAlertGr = new GlideAggregate('em_alert');
	if(current.is_group_alert != null && current.is_group_alert) {
		// For virtual alert we should
		// 1. Find the message key of the secondary alert that create the virtual alert
		// 2. Dont show the secondary alert that create the virtual alert
		// gs.log("Alert Insight: calculate Repeated Alerts for virtual group");
		message_key = emAiInsightCommon.getMessageKeyForVirtualAlertQuery(current);
		if(GlideStringUtil.notNil(message_key)) {
			repeatAlertGr.addQuery("message_key", "=", message_key);
		}
		repeatAlertGr.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", current.message_key);
	}
	if(GlideStringUtil.nil(message_key)) { // this means it is not a virtual alert
		repeatAlertGr.addQuery("message_key", "=", current.message_key);
	}
	emAiInsightCommon.addNotTheSameSysIdQuery(repeatAlertGr, current);
	emAiInsightCommon.addTimeBeforeQuery(repeatAlertGr, "evt_mgmt.alert_insight_alert_history_min", 43200 /* 30 days */);
	//gs.log("Alert Insight: calculate Repeated Alerts. Query string: " + repeatAlertGr.getEncodedQuery() );
	repeatAlertGr.addAggregate('COUNT');
	repeatAlertGr.query();
	while (repeatAlertGr.next()) {
		gs.log("Repeated Alerts: " + repeatAlertGr.getAggregate('COUNT'));
		current.u_repeated_alerts = repeatAlertGr.getAggregate('COUNT');
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>optimiz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-04 16:01:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Repeated Alerts</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>optimiz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 16:32:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fd1bfcc1975f4910ada0b9cfe153af5e"/></record_update>
